text:
Shares of NVIDIA Corp. 
        NVDA,
        +3.12%
       advanced 2.28% to $543.50 Wednesday, on what proved to be an all-around great trading session for the stock market, with the S&P 500 Index 
        SPX,
        -0.14%
       rising 0.57% to 4,783.45 and the Dow Jones Industrial Average 
        DJIA,
        -0.77%
       rising 0.45% to 37,695.73. This was the stock's fifth consecutive day of gains. NVIDIA Corp. hit a new 52-week high, surpassing its previous peak of $543.25, which the company achieved on January 9th. Trading volume (52.8 M) eclipsed its 50-day average volume of 41.5 M.
